title: Science Coach Training Program Through Interactive Practical Exercises

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented program for strengthening secondary science curriculum instruction competencies. Learners are office/administrative professionals who can leverage work experience

learning_goals: Learners gain the ability to design and guide scientific experiment projects in a PBL environment
By the end of the training, over 90% of learners acquire effective feedback-providing skills through peer evaluations
Within eight weeks after the course, 75% of participants implement science coaching projects in actual school settings
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
